archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Sales Accounts
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Manage the sales accounts assigned to the sales channel on a day-day basis Manage the sales accounts assigned to the sales channel on a day-day basis

properties.value: The purpose of the Manage Sales Accounts processes is to manage the sales accounts assigned to the sales channel and/or sales manager on a day-day basis. These processes are responsible for contacting the customers associated with each sales account on a regular basis appropriate for the type of account, to develop the appropriate relationships and contacts, to prospect for leads, to promote the enterpriseâ€™s product offerings, etc. The purpose of the Manage Sales Accounts processes is to manage the sales accounts assigned to the sales channel and/or sales manager on a day-day basis. These processes are responsible for contacting the customers associated with each sales account on a regular basis appropriate for the type of account, to develop the appropriate relationships and contacts, to prospect for leads, to promote the enterpriseâ€™s product offerings, etc.
